name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Donna CONLEY, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Donna CONLEY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of December, 1994, the order of the Superior Court, 425 Pa.Super. 642, 620 A.2d 536, is reversed, and the case is remanded for resentencing. See Commonwealth v. Williams, 539 Pa. 249, 652 A.2d 283 No. 40 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1994, Pa., filed eo die; Commonwealth v. Dickerson, 533 Pa. 294, 621 A.2d 990 (1993).
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Eliot D. Moskowitz, Philadelphia, for D. Conley.
John W. Packel, Philadelphia, for amicus, Phila. Defender Assoc.
Catherine Marshall, Ronald Eisenberg, and Hugh J. Burns, Philadelphia, for the Com.
Stuart Suss, West Chester, for amicus, Pa. D.A. Assoc.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 282
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Donna CONLEY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 17, 1994.
Decided Dec. 29, 1994.
Eliot D. Moskowitz, Philadelphia, for D. Conley.
John W. Packel, Philadelphia, for amicus, Phila. Defender Assoc.
Catherine Marshall, Ronald Eisenberg, and Hugh J. Burns, Philadelphia, for the Com.
Stuart Suss, West Chester, for amicus, Pa. D.A. Assoc.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
